name: [GD] AWS RDS Cluster Creation
description: Identifies the creation of a new Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) Aurora DB cluster or global database spread across multiple regions.
note: The AWS Filebeat module must be enabled to use this rule.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Valid clusters may be created by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Cluster creations from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
query: event.action:(CreateDBCluster or CreateGlobalCluster) and event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:rds.amazonaws.com and event.outcome:success
